_header: Saint Anicet the holy man that sometime pope was
Subjects: saints’ lives; Anicet, saint, life of
_description: ‘Seint Anicet þe holy pope’, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint anyset þe holy man þat somtyme pope wasIn þe
                    borw of rome so god him ȝef þe cas…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we to Ihesu crist for loue of seint
                    anysceteþat he vs bringe to heuene for þer is ioye
                    swete
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 398-9.
